clickThrough.title: The URL that should be loaded on button click. You can also use the following player commands: appscend://play, appscend://pause, appscend://skip and appscend://fullscreen.

items.title: A URL that should be pinged when the button is tapped by the user.

clickTracking.title: An array of URLs that should be pinged when the button is tapped by the user.
